bibl.title: A Roman Veteran and his Skilful Administrator: Gemellus and Epagathus in Light of Unpublished Papyri.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Presentation of a family archive discovered in 1898-99 by B.P. Grenfell and A.S. Hunt in a house of Kasr el Banât, ancient Euhemeria (over 80 papyri, 25 published in full and 28 described, mainly in P. Fayum). It consists primarily of private letters.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Ast Rodney and Giuseppina Azzarello, A Roman Veteran and his Skilful Administrator: Gemellus and Epagathus in Light of Unpublished Papyri.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 67-71, 1 fig.

Presentation of a family archive discovered in 1898-99 by B.P. Grenfell and A.S. Hunt in a house of Kasr el Banât, ancient Euhemeria (over 80 papyri, 25 published in full and 28 described, mainly in P. Fayum). It consists primarily of private letters.
